title: Quick beef and mushroom stir fry
ingredients: ['500g skirt or rump steak, thinly sliced', '2 teaspoons cornflour', '2 tablespoons sherry', '2 tablespoons water', '3 tablespoons soy sauce', '1 teaspoon granulated sugar', '1 tablespoon vegetable oil', '150g mushrooms, sliced', '100g beansprouts']
